item.title: Government Not Considering Minimum Work Threshold Under MGNREGA, Says Ministry
item.description: Government Not Considering Minimum Work Threshold Under MGNREGA, Says Ministry The government has spent over Rs 60,000 crore under the scheme against the budgeted Rs 73,000 crore so far this fiscal.
